name: Root Infinity Rexx: Limited Edition
summary:
Root Rexx, stylized as ROOT∞REXX, is an otome visual novel video game developed by Otomate, exclusively released for the PlayStation Vita by Idea Factory on January 22, 2015 in Japan. The game follows Mochizuki Kazune, a teenage girl who meets members of the fictional boy band Rexx.

The limited edition comes with a special booklet and exclusive drama CD.
